cause.description:
the US has massive reserves of coal, a switch to coal fueled automobiles would literally be throwing more fuel on the flame of global warming.
Also it would squash virtually all efforts to create eco-friendly automobiles.
http://www.scdigest.com/assets/newsViews/07-06-26-1.php?cid=1098
1. Liquid coal would produce more than 150% greenhouse gas as fossil fuels.
2. The US has massive reserves of coal.
cause.mission: Speak out against research into developing coal into a liquid fuel.
cause.name: Students against liqid coal
